tool_description: API for SNCF trains "Transilien" in Paris
name: Horaires transilien SNCF
title: Horaires transilien SNCF

api_list.name: Offline times
api_list.description: Get the offline times for a trip

required_parameters.name: departure
required_parameters.description: Use the 3 chars-long code for the stations

api_list.name: Last refresh
api_list.description: Get the timestamp of the last refresh of offline times
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharkoz-horaires-transilien-sncf-v1.p.rapidapi.com/refresh.txt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharkoz-horaires-transilien-sncf-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Station names
Live times
api_list.description: Live train times for a designated departure and arrival stations

required_parameters.description: Use the 3 chars-long code for the stations

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharkoz-horaires-transilien-sncf-v1.p.rapidapi.com/mobil/BGV/PSL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharkoz-horaires-transilien-sncf-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sharkoz-horaires-transilien-sncf-v1.p.rapidapi.com/mobil/{departure}/{arrival}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharkoz-horaires-transilien-sncf-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
